Discovery of N1-(4-((7-cyclopentyl-6-(dimethylcarbamoyl)-7 H-pyrrolo[2,3- d]pyrimidin-2-yl)amino)phenyl)-N8-hydroxyoctanediamide as a novel inhibitor targeting cyclin-dependent kinase 4/9 (CDK4/9) and histone deacetlyase1 (HDAC1) against malignant cancer. J Med Chem 2018; 61: 3166– 92. 29518312
